name: Sidi Bou Said
description: A picturesque town known for its blue-and-white architecture and stunning views over the Mediterranean Sea.

name: Carthage
description: An ancient city with Roman ruins by the sea, offering a mix of history and beautiful coastal views.

name: Djerba
description: A peaceful island with sandy beaches, traditional markets, and a rich blend of Berber and Arab culture.

name: Tozeur
description: An oasis town near the desert, known for its palm groves, traditional architecture, and nearby salt lakes.

name: El Jem
description: Home to one of the world’s largest Roman amphitheaters, offering a glimpse into Tunisia’s ancient glory.

name: Matmata
description: Famous for its underground troglodyte houses carved into the earth, used as a film location in Star Wars.

name: Kairouan
description: A holy city known for the Great Mosque, rich Islamic heritage, and vibrant traditional markets.

name: Bulla Regia
description: Ancient Roman site with unique underground villas that are perfectly preserved beneath the surface.

name: Ain Draham
description: A mountain town with red-roofed houses surrounded by forests, ideal for nature and hiking lovers.
